thread.title: It Looks Like Skrillex Is Actually Reuniting With His Metal Band From First To Last! [News]
thread.title_full: It Looks Like Skrillex Is Actually Reuniting With His Metal Band From First To Last! [News]

title: It Looks Like Skrillex Is Actually Reuniting With His Metal Band From First To Last! [News]
text:
It Looks Like Skrillex Is Actually Reuniting With His Metal Band From First to Last! Skrillex spotted in the studio with ex-bandmate Matt Good, image inside. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 11 hours ago 5 
The rumors circulating since last summer about Skrillex reuniting with his old post-hardcore band From First to Last have been fired up again after the popular dubstep artist was spotted in the studio with former bandmate Matt Good. 
The photo in question surfaced via Blink-182 bassist/singer Mark Hoppus' Instagram page, featuring the two boys alongside Mark, Travis Barker, and producer John Feldman. 
The cryptic caption merely reads ,"Studio hangs.". Stay tuned for updates. As you may or may not know, Skrillex was a member of the gang between 2004 and 2007. During that period, he sang on two of the band's studio efforts - 2004's "Dear Diary, My Teen Angst Has a Body Count" and 2006's "Heroine." A photo posted by Mark Hoppus (@markhoppus) on Jan 13, 2017 at 7:26am PST
